location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Aerial photograph of Sakak [As Sikak] Fort, situated in a desert landscape on the frontier between Saudi Arabia and Qatar. The photograph was taken during a Royal Air Force reconnaissance flight on 14 October 1935. A shadow of the reconnaissance plane can be seen on the ground, to the left of the fort. On the rear of the photograph is a red date stamp, marked ‘for official use only’, ‘Royal Air Force official, Crown Copyright Reserved’, and dated 16 October 1935.
